name: heloc
task_intro:
**Author**: FICO (via Kaggle contributor)  
**Source**: [Kaggle Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/averkiyoliabev/home-equity-line-of-creditheloc)  
**Please cite**: FICO Explainable Machine Learning Challenge  

* Abstract:  

This dataset contains anonymized credit applications for Home Equity Line of Credit (HELOC) accounts. Each entry represents a credit line application, with 23 features detailing the applicant's credit history and financial behavior. The goal is to predict whether an applicant will repay their HELOC account within two years.

num_feature_intro.MSinceMostRecentTradeOpen: Months since most recent trade opened
num_feature_intro.NumTrades60Ever2DerogPubRec: Number of trades 60+ days past due
num_feature_intro.NumTrades90Ever2DerogPubRec: Number of trades 90+ days past due
num_feature_intro.NumTradesOpeninLast12M: Number of trades opened in last 12 months
num_feature_intro.MSinceMostRecentInqexcl7days: Months since most recent inquiry (excluding last 7 days)
num_feature_intro.NumInqLast6M: Number of inquiries in last 6 months
num_feature_intro.NumInqLast6Mexcl7days: Number of inquiries in last 6 months (excluding last 7 days)
num_feature_intro.NetFractionRevolvingBurden: Revolving balance divided by credit limit
num_feature_intro.NetFractionInstallBurden: Installment balance divided by original loan amount
num_feature_intro.NumRevolvingTradesWBalance: Number of revolving trades with balance
num_feature_intro.NumInstallTradesWBalance: Number of installment trades with balance
num_feature_intro.NumBank2NatlTradesWHighUtilization: Number of trades with high utilization ratio

target_description: 1 if the applicant is likely to default within 2 years, else 0
